Athravaeth Gristnogavl, ḷe cair ụedi cynnụys yn grynno'r hoḷ brifbynciau syḍ i gyfarụyḍo dyn ar y phorḍ i baradụys.. Clynnog, Morys, ca. 1521-1581. Robert, Gruffydd, ca. 1522-ca. 1610, ed.
[8], 63 p. : ill.
[Vincenzo Girardoni?], Ymlen. [i.e. Milan] : 1568. dyụgụyl. S. Nicolas [i.e. feast of St. Nicholas, 6 Dec.].
Cut of Crucifixion on t.p. Imprint information from colophon; actual place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.). Edited, with preface and appendix, by Griffith Roberts. Signatures: a⁴ A-H⁴. Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
=======

[8], 63 p. : ill.
[Vincenzo Girardoni?], Ymlen. [i.e. Milan] : 1568. dyụgụyl. S. Nicolas [i.e. feast of St. Nicholas, 6 Dec.].
Cut of Crucifixion on t.p. Imprint information from colophon; actual place and publisher from STC (2nd ed.). Edited, with preface and appendix, by Griffith Roberts. Signatures: a⁴ A-H⁴. Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
